sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Equinor to commence first tranche of the 2025 share buy-back programme
feed.summary: Equinor ( OSE: EQNR, NYSE: EQNR ) will on 6 February 2025 commence the first tranche of up to USD 1.2 billion of the share buy-back programme for 2025, as announced at the Capital Market Update 5 February 2025.

feed.title: Live Streaming Market To Grow By USD 20.64 Billion From 2025-2029, Rising Smartphone Penetration And Internet Access Boosting Growth, Report On AI-Powered Market Evolution - Technavio
feed.summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 5, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Report on how AI is driving market transformation - The global live streaming market size is estimated to grow by USD 20.64 billion from 2025-2029, according to Technavio. The market is estimated to grow at a CAGR of 16.6% during the forecast period.
